content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":234802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「二メートルを越す巨体のヒーロー選手、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A hero player with a massive body over two meters tall,"},{"lineNumber":234803,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに対するは、なんとそれよりも巨体の","translatedEnglishLine":"Faced with him was the self-proclaimed ancient weapon,"},{"lineNumber":234804,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自称古代兵器である桜花選手でした」","translatedEnglishLine":"player Ouka, who was even bigger.\""},{"lineNumber":234805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「全身カラクリ仕掛けって感じの見た目で、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He looked like he was a mechanical contraption all over,"},{"lineNumber":234806,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我、目標、殲滅……我、人間、殲滅……","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying only: 'I, target, annihilate... I, human, annihilate...'"},{"lineNumber":234807,"originalJapaneseLine":"　としか言わない不気味な桜花選手」","translatedEnglishLine":"—the eerie player Ouka.\""},{"lineNumber":234808,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がっちょんがっちょん言うとるやん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You can hear the clanking and clicking sounds..."},{"lineNumber":234809,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そもそもどうやって参加したん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"How did he even manage to participate in the first place...?\""},{"lineNumber":234810,"originalJapaneseLine":"「試合開始と同時に挨拶代わりと言わんばかりに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At the start of the match, as if to greet everyone,"},{"lineNumber":234811,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レーザービームを放ちました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he unleashed a laser beam...\""},{"lineNumber":234812,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今大会で一番わけの分からん選手や……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The most baffling player in this tournament...\""},{"lineNumber":234813,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヒーロー選手も怯えて逃げ回りましたが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The hero player was also scared and ran around..."},{"lineNumber":234814,"originalJapaneseLine":"　控え室にいたパートナーに何か言われると、","translatedEnglishLine":"But when his partner in the waiting room said something,"},{"lineNumber":234815,"originalJapaneseLine":"　覚悟を決めたか相手に向き直り戦いだします」","translatedEnglishLine":"he seemed to steel himself, turned to face his opponent, and started fighting.\""},{"lineNumber":234816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その後も桜花選手は電ノコ攻撃に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After that, player Ouka attacked with a chainsaw,"},{"lineNumber":234817,"originalJapaneseLine":"　スタンガンアタックと多彩な猛攻を行いますが、","translatedEnglishLine":"and a stun gun attack in a varied fierce assault,"},{"lineNumber":234818,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのことごとくを耐え続けるヒーロー選手」","translatedEnglishLine":"but the hero player continued to endure every single attack.\""},{"lineNumber":234819,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大量の傷も作りましたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He suffered many wounds,"},{"lineNumber":234820,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一撃必殺のラリアットアタックが炸裂！","translatedEnglishLine":"then unleashed a one-hit knockout lariat attack!"},{"lineNumber":234821,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヒーロー選手が辛くも勝利を収めました！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The hero player narrowly claimed victory!\""},{"lineNumber":234822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まさに肉を斬らせて骨を断つ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Truly cutting the flesh to break the bone!"},{"lineNumber":234823,"originalJapaneseLine":"　派手で見応えある試合やったなー！","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a flashy and thrilling match!"},{"lineNumber":234824,"originalJapaneseLine":"　両選手ともよう頑張った！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Both players really gave their all!\""},{"lineNumber":234825,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっかし、ドラゴン対古代兵器って……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But still, a dragon versus an ancient weapon..."},{"lineNumber":234826,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今大会で一番の異色対決やったんちゃうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wasn't that the most unusual showdown in this translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二メートルを越す巨体のヒーロー選手、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A hero player with a massive body over two meters tall,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに対するは、なんとそれよりも巨体の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Faced with him was the self-proclaimed ancient weapon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自称古代兵器である桜花選手でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Ouka, who was even bigger."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全身カラクリ仕掛けって感じの見た目で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He looked like he was a mechanical contraption all over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我、目標、殲滅……我、人間、殲滅……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying only: 'I, target, annihilate... I, human, annihilate...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: としか言わない不気味な桜花選手」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —the eerie player Ouka."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がっちょんがっちょん言うとるやん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can hear the clanking and clicking sounds...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそもどうやって参加したん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How did he even manage to participate in the first place...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合開始と同時に挨拶代わりと言わんばかりに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At the start of the match, as if to greet everyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レーザービームを放ちました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he unleashed a laser beam..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今大会で一番わけの分からん選手や……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The most baffling player in this tournament..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヒーロー選手も怯えて逃げ回りましたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The hero player was also scared and ran around...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室にいたパートナーに何か言われると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when his partner in the waiting room said something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 覚悟を決めたか相手に向き直り戦いだします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he seemed to steel himself, turned to face his opponent, and started fighting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その後も桜花選手は電ノコ攻撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, player Ouka attacked with a chainsaw,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スタンガンアタックと多彩な猛攻を行いますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a stun gun attack in a varied fierce assault,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのことごとくを耐え続けるヒーロー選手」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the hero player continued to endure every single attack."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大量の傷も作りましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He suffered many wounds,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一撃必殺のラリアットアタックが炸裂！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then unleashed a one-hit knockout lariat attack!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーロー選手が辛くも勝利を収めました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hero player narrowly claimed victory!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさに肉を斬らせて骨を断つ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Truly cutting the flesh to break the bone!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 派手で見応えある試合やったなー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a flashy and thrilling match!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両選手ともよう頑張った！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both players really gave their all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっかし、ドラゴン対古代兵器って……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But still, a dragon versus an ancient weapon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今大会で一番の異色対決やったんちゃうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wasn't that the most unusual showdown in this tournament?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｄブロック一戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First match of Block D,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条早雲ＶＳ四天王・風のビルデ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hojo Soun vs. the Four Heavenly Kings' Kaze no Birude."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPANは北条家の宗主、天才陰陽師、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From JAPAN, the head of the Hojo family, the genius onmyoji,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条早雲選手」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Hojo Soun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「対するは本気は出さないがポリシーの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Opposing him is Birude, who never gives his all but sticks to his principles,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四天王最弱の男、糸目で怪しいと評判、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the weakest of the Four Heavenly Kings, notorious for his suspicious squinty eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 風のビルデさんの試合です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's the match with Kaze no Birude."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、四天王ならうちも知っとんで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I know the Four Heavenly Kings too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確か去年の大会を盛り上げてくれた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were the four warriors who livened up last year's tournament,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四人の戦士やねんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、というわけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今年の出場にも大いに期待が寄せられています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are great expectations for their participation this year as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「し、しかし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-But...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試合開始直後、対戦相手である早雲選手の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right after the match started, Hojo Soun's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陰陽攻撃にビルデ選手、囲まれてしまいました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: onmyo attack surrounded Birude."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自慢の四天王一の速さを見せることなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Without showing off his proud top speed of the Four Heavenly Kings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あえなくビルデ選手はギブアップ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Birude gave up without a fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにはファンの皆さんも嘆いていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fans were dismayed by this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、本人の談がほんまなら四天王最弱らしいし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, if his own story is true, he really is the weakest of the Four Heavenly Kings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の四天王の面々に期待しようやないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so let's put our hopes on the other members."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｄブロック二戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Second match of Block D,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスタリスクＶＳドギ・マギ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Asterisk vs. Doggie Maggy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「嫁を沢山抱えたニヤケ顔の男、アスタ選手と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Asterisk, the grinning man with many wives, and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元山賊のかしらである不細工で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doggie, the ugly, huge axe-wielding former bandit chief,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨漢の斧使いドギ選手と対照的な戦い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: face off in a contrasting battle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「結果はアスタ選手が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The result was Asterisk's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざくざくしゅぱーんで圧勝」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: crushing victory with quick slashes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アスタさんの嫁達も大喜びで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Asterisk's wives were also delighted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアムでキスまで披露してくれちゃいました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even giving a kiss display in the colosseum."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これじゃあ、あんまりに可哀想だと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of this, some even sympathized with Doggie,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドギ選手に同情の声まで上がったとかなんとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: saying it's just too cruel."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、今回の試合はこんな感じでーっす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, that's roughly how the matches went this time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コパンドンさん、何かご感想はありますか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Copandon-san, do you have any impressions?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「優勝候補は沢山おるけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are many candidates for the championship, but..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二メートルを越す巨体のヒーロー選手、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A hero player with a massive body over two meters tall,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに対するは、なんとそれよりも巨体の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Faced with him was the self-proclaimed ancient weapon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自称古代兵器である桜花選手でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Ouka, who was even bigger."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全身カラクリ仕掛けって感じの見た目で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He looked like he was a mechanical contraption all over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我、目標、殲滅……我、人間、殲滅……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying only: 'I, target, annihilate... I, human, annihilate...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: としか言わない不気味な桜花選手」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —the eerie player Ouka."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がっちょんがっちょん言うとるやん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can hear the clanking and clicking sounds...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそもどうやって参加したん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How did he even manage to participate in the first place...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合開始と同時に挨拶代わりと言わんばかりに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At the start of the match, as if to greet everyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レーザービームを放ちました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he unleashed a laser beam..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今大会で一番わけの分からん選手や……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The most baffling player in this tournament..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヒーロー選手も怯えて逃げ回りましたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The hero player was also scared and ran around...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室にいたパートナーに何か言われると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when his partner in the waiting room said something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 覚悟を決めたか相手に向き直り戦いだします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he seemed to steel himself, turned to face his opponent, and started fighting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その後も桜花選手は電ノコ攻撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, player Ouka attacked with a chainsaw,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スタンガンアタックと多彩な猛攻を行いますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a stun gun attack in a varied fierce assault,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのことごとくを耐え続けるヒーロー選手」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the hero player continued to endure every single attack."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大量の傷も作りましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He suffered many wounds,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一撃必殺のラリアットアタックが炸裂！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then unleashed a one-hit knockout lariat attack!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーロー選手が辛くも勝利を収めました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hero player narrowly claimed victory!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさに肉を斬らせて骨を断つ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Truly cutting the flesh to break the bone!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 派手で見応えある試合やったなー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a flashy and thrilling match!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両選手ともよう頑張った！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both players really gave their all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっかし、ドラゴン対古代兵器って……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But still, a dragon versus an ancient weapon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今大会で一番の異色対決やったんちゃうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wasn't that the most unusual showdown in this tournament?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｄブロック一戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First match of Block D,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条早雲ＶＳ四天王・風のビルデ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hojo Soun vs. the Four Heavenly Kings' Kaze no Birude."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPANは北条家の宗主、天才陰陽師、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From JAPAN, the head of the Hojo family, the genius onmyoji,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条早雲選手」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Hojo Soun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「対するは本気は出さないがポリシーの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Opposing him is Birude, who never gives his all but sticks to his principles,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四天王最弱の男、糸目で怪しいと評判、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the weakest of the Four Heavenly Kings, notorious for his suspicious squinty eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 風のビルデさんの試合です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's the match with Kaze no Birude."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、四天王ならうちも知っとんで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I know the Four Heavenly Kings too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確か去年の大会を盛り上げてくれた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were the four warriors who livened up last year's tournament,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四人の戦士やねんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、というわけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今年の出場にも大いに期待が寄せられています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are great expectations for their participation this year as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「し、しかし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-But...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試合開始直後、対戦相手である早雲選手の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right after the match started, Hojo Soun's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陰陽攻撃にビルデ選手、囲まれてしまいました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: onmyo attack surrounded Birude."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自慢の四天王一の速さを見せることなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Without showing off his proud top speed of the Four Heavenly Kings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あえなくビルデ選手はギブアップ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Birude gave up without a fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにはファンの皆さんも嘆いていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fans were dismayed by this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、本人の談がほんまなら四天王最弱らしいし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, if his own story is true, he really is the weakest of the Four Heavenly Kings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の四天王の面々に期待しようやないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so let's put our hopes on the other members."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｄブロック二戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Second match of Block D,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスタリスクＶＳドギ・マギ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Asterisk vs. Doggie Maggy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「嫁を沢山抱えたニヤケ顔の男、アスタ選手と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Asterisk, the grinning man with many wives, and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元山賊のかしらである不細工で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doggie, the ugly, huge axe-wielding former bandit chief,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨漢の斧使いドギ選手と対照的な戦い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: face off in a contrasting battle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「結果はアスタ選手が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The result was Asterisk's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざくざくしゅぱーんで圧勝」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: crushing victory with quick slashes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アスタさんの嫁達も大喜びで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Asterisk's wives were also delighted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアムでキスまで披露してくれちゃいました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even giving a kiss display in the colosseum."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これじゃあ、あんまりに可哀想だと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of this, some even sympathized with Doggie,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドギ選手に同情の声まで上がったとかなんとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: saying it's just too cruel."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、今回の試合はこんな感じでーっす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, that's roughly how the matches went this time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コパンドンさん、何かご感想はありますか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Copandon-san, do you have any impressions?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「優勝候補は沢山おるけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are many candidates for the championship, but..."
